thread.title: Mercyhurst Prep and Fairview Win Tennis Titles
thread.title_full: Mercyhurst Prep and Fairview Win Tennis Titles

author: Gary Drapcho
title: Mercyhurst Prep and Fairview Win Tennis Titles
text:
Mercyhurst Prep and Fairview Win Tennis Titles   
Mercyhurst Prep claimed the District 10 Girls AA Team Tennis Title with a 5-0 win over Hickory. Singles winners were Nicole Freeman, Caitlyn Schulz and Audrey Bell along with the doubles teams of Kern-Dinicola and Baldwin-Golden. Fairview won the D10 AAA crown with a 5-0 win over Oil City.. The Lady Tigers got singles wins from Shannon Sertz, Julie Schwartz and Stephanie Ace while doubles winners were Klemm-Wilcko and Jasinski-Daeschner. Both teams begin PIAA competition next Tuesday at the Pennbriar. Current Conditions
